body.name: Dove Men+Care Body and Face Bar More Moisturizing Than Bar Soap Deep Clean Effectively Washes Away Bacteria, Nourishes Your Skin, 3.75 Ounce (Pack of 8)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the DOVE MEN + CARE Store

features: Dove Men+Care Body and Face Bar thoroughly cleanses and hydrates skin for healthier, stronger skin versus regular soap. Deep Clean bar that effectively washes away bacteria, nourishes your skin.
Thoroughly cleans skin without leaving it feel dry or tight
Patented design with unique technology developed for men's skin
body.description: Product Description Looking for a bar soap for men that cleanses while also helping protect from dry skin? Dove Men+Care Deep Clean Body and Face Bar contains purifying grains and delivers a deep, refreshing clean that leaves skin feeling hydrated and strong. Dove Men+Care Body and Face Bar effectively washes away bacteria, nourishes your skin. Body and face soap bar goes beyond just delivering a deep clean: it helps to protect skin from feeling tight and dry with its unique formula made for men’s skin. With ¼ moisturizing cream, the Dove Men+Care Deep Clean Body and Face Bar nourishes for skin that feels healthy and strong. This #1 Dermatologist Recommended body soap and face soap bar helps to maintain skin’s hydration levels and protect skin against dryness. Regular men’s bar soap can often leave skin feeling tight and dry, but Dove Men+Care Deep Clean Body and Face Bar helps maintain skin’s moisture to provide skin comfort and refreshment. Plus, its formula is non-comedogenic and mild and gentle enough to use on your face. To use Dove Men+Care Deep Clean Body and Face Bar, wet the body bar in the shower and massage into your face and body to create a light foam before rinsing thoroughly. The lather rinses cleanly away without leaving behind a greasy feel. Dove Men+Care Deep Clean Body and Face Bar has a classic scent, and is clinically proven to fight skin dryness. This body bar not only cleanses, but also leaves your skin feeling healthy and strong. Brand Story By Dove

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEEP CLEAN The purifying grains in this body and face bar deliver a deep, refreshing wash while providing skin comfort, hydration and refreshment. RECOMMENDED MEN'S BRAND This body and face bar is specifically designed for men to deep cleanse and wash away bacteria, and leave your skin feeling nourished and refreshed. BODY AND FACE BAR This bar moisturizes better than ordinary soaps, and is hydrating and gentle enough to use your face and body. REAL STRENGTH IS CRUELTY-FREE Dove is Cruelty-Free by PETA. Globally, Dove does not test on animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The old days
reviews.reviewText: I’m dating myself here…remember in high school auto shop they had that powder soap with the crushed pumice? This is the grown up version of that soap. The soap is not drying. The pumice isn’t like scrubbing with sandpaper, and the smell is not girly. Gets me clean, leaves me comfortable, doesn’t make me smell like my wife. Great stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than than classic soaps
reviews.reviewText: Great, overall... it is soap and we don't think about that too much.I used to get by with the more classic harsh soaps like Dial and Irish Spring.This Dove soap simply is less harsh and better for your skin. I can get flaky so a smoother soap like this has helped a lot. It also smells great but is not fruity or anything. It lathers up really well too. Which also makes it a great hand soap.The charcoal bits are a gimmick for sure and will cause it to run little dark as if you're washing away grease or dirt. It's not really going to reliably exfoliate or anything but it gives a little feedback I guess. It's better to use a wash cloth and/or an exfoliating cloth (Korean thing) anyway.It will totally fall apart if left in a pool of water, so don't do that.We run through these faster than the other soaps I mentioned but nothing extreme. Worth it in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great smells great
reviews.reviewText: It has little exfoliating beads which I really love

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Body/Bar Soap - Affordable, Works Great
reviews.reviewText: I've used a ton of different soaps over my life, bar, and liquid. This has been my go-to and favorite body soap since I first tried it. Each bar has some grit in it for exfoliation and does a great job of cleaning and moisturizing, especially in winter months when it can get very dry in my location (North East US).I've found this not only to work extremely well but is both affordable and each bar tends to last me quite a long time. I also enjoy the scent.Overall, I've continued to come back and purchase this whenever I'm running low and will continue to do so for the foreseeable future. One of the best name-brand bar soap I've used in my life; smells great, cleans, moisturizes, exfoliates, and each bar goes a long way. I'll continue to keep stock of this and certainly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchase this for my husband. He loves how soft the dove soap is on his skin and the scent is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well and has a nice scent for men

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS SOAP
reviews.reviewText: This is good stuff, got you clean didn't dry you out. With regular use your skin gets soft and supple difginantly buying again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best soap in the market
reviews.reviewText: This soap clean very easy and leaves a very good clean feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These bars from from USA or Canada by looks of it. They are slightly larger than the UK Dove soaps you get from Boots etc.... Great soap though, scrubs you clean and leaves a none-too feminine smell. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this soap for a while, and don't imagine changing for anything else. I work long shifts driving a van, so by the end of the day, I need an effective soap. This smells good, doesn't dry my skin out, and gets the ground in grime off of my arms and hands. I don't use this on my face (I use sanex zero). This smells so good, you could open up a bar, and the room will smell of the soap.Great cleaning soap, great smell, and great for cleaning up after manual working jobs.
Sehr angenehme Seife mit tollem Duft und nettem Peelingeffekt. Täglich benutzt hält sie ca. 3-4 Wochen.
Saponetta fresca, con un profumo maschile intenso e avvolgente. Una schiuma fine e morbida, ottima per la doccia o per una lavata al viso rinvigorente. Consiglio l'acquisto.
